Metadata.Title: Applications Are Compiled with Stack Cookies Enabled

Content.Data:
==What to Check For==
Verify that applications are compiled with stack cookies enabled.
==Why==
Stack cookies help mitigate buffer overflow vulnerabilities.
==How to Check==
To verify that stack cookies are enabled:
# **Open XCode.** Launch the XCode IDE. # **Check compiler flags.** Examine the "Compile Sources" window to make sure the //-fstack-protector-all// flag is present in the "Compiler Flags" column for each file that is to be compiled.
==How to Fix==
To use stack cookies: # **Open XCode.** Launch the XCode IDE. # **Add compiler flags.** Add the //-fstack-protector-all// flag to each file that is to be compiled in the XCode "Compile Sources" window in the "Compiler Flags" column.
